quotes: I haven't had such a crappy day since yesterday!
Being with someone means solving as a pair problems you'd never have on your own.
I invented a coat that's good for all seasons; when it's hot, just take it off.
He who sleeps doesn't need sleeping pills.
He who leaves the old road for the new one arrives sooner because it's paved.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away, and an apple every six hours gets rid of four doctors.
It's easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a needle if it's well-oiled.
Love your neighbor: not this one, the next one!
If you're looking for a hand willing to help you, you'll find it at the end of your arm.
There are only two perfect men: one is dead and the other was never born.
